Address.label: Address
Address.value: 240 EAST HACIENDA AVENUE, CAMPBELL, California, 95008, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: ChargePoint designs, develops, and markets networked electric vehicle charging system infrastructure and cloud-based services that enable consumers to locate, reserve, and authenticate EV charging. The company's hardware product lineup includes solutions across home, commercial, and fast-charging applications. ChargePoint derives the majority of its revenue from the United States.
